section.heading: Post audit examinations by state auditor

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 74 > Chapter 74.09 > Section 74.09.600 74.09.597 << 74.09.600 >> 74.09.605 PDF RCW 74.09.600 Post audit examinations by state auditor. Nothing in this chapter shall preclude the state auditor from conducting post audit examinations of public funds pursuant to RCW 43.09.330 or other applicable law. [ 1977 ex.s. c 260 s 6 .] NOTES: Severability — 1977 ex.s. c 260: "If any provision of this act, or its application to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the remainder of the act, or the application of the provision to other persons or circumstances is not affected." [ 1977 ex.s. c 260 s 8 .]
